strings.CLASSICITEMSRETURNS_ITEM_MYSTERIOUSVIAL_:
Order: Mysterious Vial
Tracking Number: 1503***********
Estimated Delivery: 03/06/2056
Shipping Method: Standard/Fragile
Sent To: Sheridan S.
Shipping Address: 4000 15th Ave, UNITED STATES, Earth
Shipping Details:

Apply to skin for a rapidly acting gel that contains both antiseptics and an agent to encourage protein synthesis!

Small wounds applied with our gel should heal within a maximum of 5 hours, while broken bones and torn ligaments may take a few weeks.

NOTE: Side effects may include itching, rashes, bleeding, sensitivity of skin, dry patches, permanent scarring, misaligned bone regrowth, rotting of the..

Shipping Method: Standard
Shipping Address: 103 110th, Northlake, Mars

Biggest. Ginseng. Root. Ever.

Not really, but it's pretty freakin' huge. You can boil it or sun dry it, whatever you want. I'll be curious to see if your cancer research actually pans out; sounds like voodoo magic to me, herbal medicine, but if the natives say it works, it works.

strings.CLASSICITEMSRETURNS_ITEM_SNAKEEYES_LORE:
Order: Snake Eyes
Tracking Number: 1500***********
Estimated Delivery: 01/01/2056
Shipping Method: Standard
Shipping Address: 1843, GMG Services, Venus
Shipping Details:

You dirty ---------er. You KNEW I had to win to pay off my debts. Are you in with the casinos? Of course you are; a snake like you would. A dice that's loaded for SNAKE EYES. CUTE MOVE, --------er.

I'm comin' for you, ----.
strings.CLASSICITEMSRETURNS_ITEM_PENNY_PICKUP: 치명타 확률이 증가하고 치명타 공격이 골드를 생성합니다.

Tracking Number: 3023***********
Estimated Delivery: 01/22/2056
Shipping Method: Standard
Shipping Address: Residential 24, Anlesburg, Mars
Shipping Details:

No way they allowed these on the market. I know it was ages ago but it's seriously concerning. Imagine having... I don't know, 10 of these in your pocket (you know, pocket change)? Reach in and woops! Mangled hand!
Cities didn't switch to virtual currencies for nothing...
strings.CLASSICITEMSRETURNS_ITEM_ARCANEBLADES_LO:

HEY KID!! happy birthday i found these old skates in the attic they were granddads but they look great.. you were talking about getting more exercise last time you visited these should do the trick.
ma is still obsessed with her garden you should visit next summer and see how crazy she is
do you still have that boyfriend?? mom wants to know when your getting married haha
CALL ME SOMETIME!!!!

strings.CLASSICITEMSRETURNS_ITEM_MUCONSTRUCT_PIC: 텔레포터를 활성화한 후 일정 시간마다 회복합니다.
strings.CLASSICITEMSRETURNS_ITEM_MUCONSTRUCT_LOR:
Order: Mu Construct
Tracking Number: 1748***********
Estimated Delivery: 06/04/2056
Shipping Method: Field-Found
Shipping Address: Complex 3B, Saturn, ???
Shipping Details:

...And I thought everything on this planet was out to kill me.
Once I found it, it wouldn't stop following me. It's very curious about shiny objects and has taken to spinning whenever I am trying to rest. It simply doesn't want to stand still.
It's pushy, but this far away from home I find the company very soothing.
strings.CLASSICITEMSRETURNS_ITEM_56LEAFCLOVER_PI: 엘리트 몬스터를 처치시 가끔 아이템을 떨어뜨립니다.
strings.CLASSICITEMSRETURNS_ITEM_56LEAFCLOVER_LO:
Order: 56 Leaf Clover
Tracking Number: 1428***********
Estimated Delivery: 12/24/2056
Shipping Method: Priority
Shipping Address: 777, Lucky Drop, Earth
Shipping Details:

A FIFTY-FREAKIN-SIX leaf clover! It was sent to me from a fan, picked from the top of Mount Drummond. It lived through the mountain fire; imagine that! I'm keeping it in observation to make sure it doesn't wilt; this is a once in a lifetime specimen! Think of all the elixirs we could make.. I may use a few of them myself and go hit the lottery!
strings.CLASSICITEMSRETURNS_ITEM_ARMSRACE_DESCRI: 드론이 주기적으로 <style=cIsDamage>{1}</style><style=cStack>(중첩당 +{2})</style>발의 미사일을 발사하여 각각 <style=cIsDamage>{3}%</style>의 피해를 입힙니다. <style=cIsUtility>{0}</style>초 후에 재충전됩니다.
strings.CLASSICITEMSRETURNS_ITEM_ARMSRACE_LORE:
Order: Arms Race
Tracking Number: 1453***********
Estimated Delivery: 08/03/2056
Shipping Method: Priority
Shipping Address: 9834, Cortical Fund, Mars
Shipping Details:

Psst. Hey. Yeah, I'm whispering over text.

So the upgrades for your drones are in. It's compatible with all KS-I slotted drones, even the non-combat oriented ones, so you can refurbish some of your cleaning units to help in the fight. Strap it onto the back, and the drone AI should sort itself out. Contains both a missile and mortar launcher. Let's continue this arms race, eh?
strings.CLASSICITEMSRETURNS_ITEM_GOLDENGUN_DESCR: <style=cIsUtility>현재 보유한 골드</style>를 기반으로 <style=cIsUtility>{2}골드</style><style=cStack>(중첩당 +{3}골드)</style>에 따라 최대 <style=cIsDamage>+{0}%</style><style=cStack>(중첩당 +{1}%)</style>의 <style=cIsDamage>추가 피해</style>를 입힙니다. 시간이 지날수록 비례합니다.

strings.CLASSICITEMSRETURNS_ITEM_PRISONSHACKLES_: 공격 명중 시 그 적에게 <style=cIsDamage>족쇄를</style> 채워, <style=cIsDamage>{1}</style>초<style=cStack>(중첩당 +{2}초)</style> 동안 <style=cIsDamage>공격 속도를 {0}% 감소</style>시킵니다.

Order: Prison Shackles
Tracking Number: 1458***********
Estimated Delivery: 02/06/2056
Shipping Method: Priority
Shipping Address: 94123 Bldg. 201, Fort Mason
Shipping Details:

An artifact from the old ages, before we used holo-cuffs. The advantage is that EMP blasts and remote-hacking can't disable good-old steel and chains. Fitting this on larger prisoners may be harder.
I know you guys have been having a serious break-out problem in the last few months, and this is sure to throw those prison breakers for a loop. Just don't lose the key.
We are shipping about.. 500, because we have nothing better to do with them than smelt them for steel, which is barely worth more than dirt this day and age. Would probably cost more than getting rid of them.
strings.CLASSICITEMSRETURNS_ITEM_SMARTSHOPPER_DE: 적 처치 시 <style=cIsUtility>{0}%</style><style=cStack>(중첩당 +{1}%)</style>의 골드를 추가로 획득합니다.

Order: Smart Shopper
Tracking Number: 1451***********
Estimated Delivery: 12/24/1962
Shipping Method: Priority
Shipping Address: 200 West Street, City of Gold, Earth
Shipping Details:

Honey! HONEY! Look! I /told/ you I still had enough left over! Yeah, weird huh? I swear the last $5 I used was the last one I had in my purse, but then when I looked again, I still had a bit left over. Strange, huh?

Maybe it's black magic, haha! Honey?
strings.CLASSICITEMSRETURNS_ITEM_TOUGHTIMES_LORE:

Shipping Details:

"Bears are just about the only toy that can lose just about everything and still maintain their dignity and worth."
- Samantha Armstrong.

Don't forget, hon. I'm coming home soon. Stay strong.

Order: Rusty Jetpack
Tracking Number: 1415***********
Estimated Delivery: 01/01/2056
Shipping Method: Priority
Shipping Address: Fun Center, 2105, NE Taurus
Shipping Details:

Sorry, it seems to be broken. It only works for a split second; maybe I'll send you a fully working jetpack in a few months? Should work well enough for the carnival!
Make sure to keep the kiddos away from the bottom; it shoots out quite a jet. Can make for fun obstacle challenges.
strings.CLASSICITEMSRETURNS_ITEM_ROYALMEDALLION_: 보스 몬스터 공격 적중 시 버프 부여 오브를 생성합니다.

보스 몬스터 공격 적중 시 <style=cIsDamage>10%</style> 확률로 <style=cIsUtility>버프 부여 오브가 </style>. 오브는 <style=cIsDamage>체력 재생, 공격 속도, 이동 속도, 기본 피해량을 향상</style>시킵니다. <style=cIsDamage>10초</style><style=cStack>(중첩당 +6초)</style> 동안 지속됩니다.

Order: Royal Medallion
Tracking Number: 2746***********
Estimated Delivery: 05/03/2056
Shipping Method: Priority
Shipping Address: #4 Visitors, Wing 4, Aeolus 2
Shipping Details:

On the outer orbits of our system lies a confederacy of people.
With kings and lords; knights and warriors, it's monarchical in nature.
Each member of the major hierarchy carries a medallion, granting courage and fortitude.
This one belonged to a prince, his name buried under strife and accusations of treachery.
Stripped away from his belongings, his medallion remained as nothing more than a curiosity by the humble forager who found it, far from where it was worn.
Now, I pass it on to you. Whether your destiny lies in the stars or your heart calls for home, your valor will be unrivaled. Keep fighting, son.
strings.CLASSICITEMSRETURNS_ITEM_THALLIUM_PICKUP: 공격 시 적을 중독시킬 확률이 생깁니다.

Order: Permafrost
Tracking Number: 1380***********

strings.CLASSICITEMSRETURNS_ITEM_WICKEDRING_DESC: <style=cIsDamage>치명타 확률이 {0}%</style> 증가합니다. <style=cIsDamage>치명타 적중 시</style> <style=cIsUtility>재사용 대기시간</style>을 <style=cIsUtility>{1}초</style><style=cStack>(중첩당 +{2}초)</style> 감소시킵니다.
strings.CLASSICITEMSRETURNS_ITEM_WICKEDRING_LORE:
Order: Wicked Ring
Tracking Number: 1372***********
Estimated Delivery: 02/22/2056
Shipping Method: High Priority/Fragile
Shipping Address: 1414 East, Fillmore, Venus
Shipping Details:

With how many rings he had, you would think more would have been found, eh? Nope, just this one. The King used to sacrifice one of his own sons to embue with dark spirits. He claimed that the spirits warded away any ill omen. The King lived until he was 104, so hey, maybe he was right.

As the last remaining Wicked Ring, I expect a hefty sum.
strings.CLASSICITEMSRETURNS_ITEM_HYPERTHREADER_D: 적에게 공격 적중 시 <style=cIsDamage>{0}%</style> 확률로 <style=cIsDamage>레이저를 발사</style>하여 <style=cIsDamage>{1}%의 피해</style>를 입힙니다. 레이저는 <style=cIsDamage>{2}명</style><style=cStack>(중첩당 +{3}명)</style>의 적에게 <style=cIsDamage>튕깁니다</style>.
strings.CLASSICITEMSRETURNS_ITEM_HYPERTHREADER_L:
Order: Hyper-Threader
Tracking Number: 1360***********
Estimated Delivery: 12/08/2056
Shipping Method: High Priority/Fragile
Shipping Address: 6900 West, Advanced Warfare Center, Mars
Shipping Details:

Despite its appearance, the FNA 200 'Hyper-Threader' Energy Subrifle is anything but fragile.

Using direct energy energy technology, the FNA 200 can fire superheated gases at a high fire rate. The FNA 200 also requires little to no charging, instead generating energy from the air around it.
strings.CLASSICITEMSRETURNS_ITEM_HITLIST_PICKUP: 표식이 부여된 적 처치 시 영구적으로 피해량을 증가시킵니다.

strings.CLASSICITEMSRETURNS_ITEM_MORTARTUBE_DESC: 공격 적중 시 <style=cIsDamage>{0}%</style> 확률로 박격포를 발사하여 <style=cIsDamage>총 {1}%<style=cStack>(중첩당 +{2}%)</style>의 피해</style>를 입힙니다.
strings.CLASSICITEMSRETURNS_ITEM_MORTARTUBE_LORE:
Order: Mortar Tube
Tracking Number: 1487***********
Estimated Delivery: 05/19/1946
Shipping Method: MILITARY
Shipping Address: 437 West, Old Bunker, Earth
Shipping Details:

Well, uh.. it's a little outdated. You stick explosives down the end, then you fire the explosive. With more explosives. If you're trying to reduce your injury rate, don't use these.

Other than its archaic design, the mortar tube is actually pretty decent if you can get a lot of them in a battery.  Can blanket a big area, like [REDACTED]. I suppose you can beat them with the tube afterwards.
strings.CLASSICITEMSRETURNS_ITEM_GUARDIANSHEART_: 최대 체력의 <style=cIsHealing>{0}%</style><style=cStack>(스택당 +{1}%)</style>에 해당하는 방어막을 얻습니다. 방어막이 파괴되면 나머지 피해는 <style=cIsHealing>+{2}의 방어력</style><style=cStack>(스택당 +{3})</style>이 적용됩니다. 위험에서 벗어나 있을 때 재충전됩니다.
최대 체력의 <style=cIsHealing>{0}%</style><style=cStack>(스택당 +{1}%)</style>에 해당하는 방어막을 얻습니다. 방어막이 파괴되면 나머지 피해는 <style=cIsHealing>차단</style>됩니다. 위험에서 벗어나 있을 때 재충전됩니다.

Order: Guardian's Heart
Tracking Number: 1439***********
Estimated Delivery: 09/16/2056
Shipping Method: Priority/Biological
Shipping Address: 1100 Fairview, Research Center, Mars
Shipping Details:

Test subject 150053 results. While living, the subject had advanced muscle growth, cell regeneration, higher agility, and increased intelligence, along with a blue hue to his skin. 
On 08/23/2056, the subject broke free of his restraints and freed all other test subjects. All test subjects, including 150053, were terminated.

His heart seems to still beat independent of the rest of his body. Perhaps a transplant into another subject can continue research.
